trustfund:

            SECTOR AND BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF056725-PHRD-KYRGYZ: PAYMENTS AND
            BANKING SYSTEM MODERNIZATION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Payments and
            Banking System Modernization Project are to assist the
            Borrower in the implementation of the national payments
            system modernization program and banking system reform. The
            restructuring will cancel savings and certain project
            activities due to changed circumstances and, consequently,
            amend the Project Development Objectives (PDO) and the
            results framework. Specifically, the changes include
            firstly, cancellation of SDR 1,457,917.85 that consists of
            savings under the goods category available for the payment
            system modernization, general ledger system and project
            implementation components and the remaining funds for
            Savings and Settlement Corporation (SSC), Aiylbank and
            modernization of the banking sector activities under the
            banking sector reform component. Secondly, the changes
            include adjustment of the PDO to reflect the cancellation by
            removing 'banking sector reform' from the PDOs.
            Thirdly, the changes comprise amendment of the result
            framework to reflect the cancellation, the extension of the
            closing date approved on April 26, 2012, negative impact of
            difficult external circumstances on some targets or to
            otherwise enhance the completeness of the result framework.
